content: hello this pattern is a cal crochet along project we have used the simple granny square for our top this project is meant for absolute beginners so you are welcome to join us even if you have absolutely no prior experience making yourself a top so we are intentionally keeping this very simple the top is being constructed in a manner that will allow you to customize however each of you want to we will go through the project step by step right from how to measure yourself to finishing your top we are doing this as a video cal on my youtube channel videos will be added to the playlist as well do them and disclaimer since our target audience are absolute beginners some of the videos may be painfully slow if you have any questions please feel free to dm me on ravelry/instagram or leave a comment on the videos thank you for joining this cal i look forward to seeing all of your completed tops daisy
